name: library-management-system
description: Library Management System with separated frontend and backend

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.start: echo Starting backend and frontend servers... && start /B cmd /c "cd backend && npm start" && timeout /t 3 /nobreak && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.dev: echo Starting backend and frontend in dev mode... && start /B cmd /c "cd backend && npm run dev" && timeout /t 3 /nobreak && cd frontend && npm run dev
